p: Antibacterial activity of six EOs was investigated in a quantitative approach on four important human pathogens. CSEO (IC 50: 1.0 mg.mL –1), CZEO (IC 50: 1.0 mg.mL –1), CSEO (4.7 mg.mL –1), and ADEO (IC 50: 1.3 mg.mL –1) were the most effective against S. aureus, E. coli, P. aeruginosa and K. pneumoniae, respectively. These EOs could be used for developing inexpensive, potent, and green antibacterial agents.
